BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Organizations

Items.Title: Oversight - Censorship in the Arts and Cultural Sector.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Censorship in the Arts and Cultural Sector.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign, legislation declaring the ocean liner the SS United States a historic location, allocating funds for the ocean liner’s restoration, and its relocation to the city of New York.
Items.MatterName: Declaring the ocean liner the SS United States a historic location, allocating funds for the ocean liner’s restoration, and its relocation to the city of New York.

Items.Title: Resolution declaring July 26 as Haitian Konpa Day annually to celebrate the legacy of Haitian music and dance in the cultural landscape of City of New York
Items.MatterName: Declaring July 26 as Haitian Konpa Day.

Items.Title: Resolution designating November 12 annually as Sigma Gamma Rho Day in the City of New York to recognize the sorority’s commitment to sisterhood, scholarship, and service and to positive community impact
Items.MatterName: Designating November 12 annually as Sigma Gamma Rho Day.
